data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle drive upfield and Raul Ruidiaz gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a San Jose defender.
Seattle are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jair Marrufo signals a Seattle throw-in in San Jose's half.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in for San Jose at CenturyLink Field.
San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 11, Can Seattle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
In the minute 14, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Free kick San Jose.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to San Jose.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Seattle.
Nouhou Tolo (Seattle) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 25, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick in a good position for Seattle!
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Throw-in San Jose.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of San Jose.
In Seattle San Jose attack through Cade Cowell. The finish is off target, however.
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Seattle in the half of San Jose.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 42, Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
The first half has been concluded at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
San Jose to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 50, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle.
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro is on target but unsuccessful.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Seattle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, Seattle take a 1-0 lead thanks to Nicolas Lodeiro.
Raul Ruidiaz puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Cristian Roldan instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 55, Jair Marrufo signals a Seattle throw-in in San Jose's half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to San Jose just outside Seattle's area.
Goal! Marcos Lopez pulls one back for San Jose to make it 2-1.
In the minute 58, Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
The away team have replaced Nick Lima with Tommy Thompson. This is the third substitution made today by Matias Jesus Almeyda.
Eric Calvillo is replacing Luis Felipe for the away team.
In the minute 59, Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's second substitution at CenturyLink Field with Siad Haji replacing Cristian Espinoza.
Seattle have a goal kick.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 64, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
Seattle make their first substitution with Alex Roldan replacing Nouhou Tolo.
In the minute 66, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Jair Marrufo signals a San Jose throw-in in Seattle's half.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Yeimar Gomez Andrade (Seattle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Jose needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to San Jose's area.
In the minute 72, Free kick San Jose.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to San Jose.
Oswaldo Alanis of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
It's now 3-1 in Seattle as Jordan Morris scores for Seattle.
Great play from Nicolas Lodeiro to set up the goal.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
Throw-in San Jose.
Throw-in for San Jose at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 78, Seattle's Raul Ruidiaz breaks free at CenturyLink Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
San Jose have a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 80, Marcos Lopez blunders with an own goal. This makes it 4-1.
Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a second substitution, with Jordy Delem replacing Kelvin Leerdam.
Paul Marie is on a sub for Marcos Lopez for San Jose.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Joevin Jones with Jimmy Medranda.
San Jose drives forward and Siad Haji gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 86, In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paul Marie gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Jose.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
It's 4-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The home team replace Jordan Morris with Shandon Hopeau.
Josh Atencio is replacing Joao Paulo for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
